markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distracting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered. If you critically hit your hunted prey with a ranged weapon, or hit it at least twice on the same turn with a ranged weapon, it’s flat-footed until the start of your next turn.

<title level="2">Distracting Shot leads to...</title>
[Greater Distracting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=535)
name: Distracting Shot
